feed.title: Security Advisory for PHP packages hosted at packagist.org
feed.subtitle: Security Advisory for PHP packages hosted at packagist.org on GitHub

entry.title: [funadmin/funadmin] Funadmin vulnerable to SQL injection
entry.content:
Funadmin v3.2.0 was discovered to contain a SQL injection vulnerability via the selectFields parameter at \controller\auth\Auth.php.

References

  • https://nvd.nist.gov/vuln/detail/CVE-2023-24774
  • https://github.com/funadmin/funadmin/issues/12
  • https://github.com/advisories/GHSA-jx2x-fg9p-7gc7

entry.title: [froxlor/froxlor] Froxlor is vulnerable to authentication bypass
entry.content:
Authentication Bypass by Primary Weakness in GitHub repository froxlor/froxlor prior to 2.0.13.

References

  • https://nvd.nist.gov/vuln/detail/CVE-2023-1307
  • https://github.com/froxlor/froxlor/commit/6777fbf229200f4fd566022e186548391219ab23
  • https://huntr.dev/bounties/5fe85af4-a667-41a9-a00d-f99e07c5e2f1
  • https://github.com/advisories/GHSA-j83x-r9qq-9g4v

entry.title: [cockpit-hq/cockpit] cockpit-hq/cockpit is vulnerable to unrestricted file uploads
entry.content:
Unrestricted Upload of File with Dangerous Type in GitHub repository cockpit-hq/cockpit prior to 2.4.1.

References

  • https://nvd.nist.gov/vuln/detail/CVE-2023-1313
  • https://github.com/cockpit-hq/cockpit/commit/becca806c7071ecc732521bb5ad0bb9c64299592
  • https://huntr.dev/bounties/f73eef49-004f-4b3b-9717-90525e65ba61
  • https://github.com/advisories/GHSA-6x8f-x6qw-qwx3

entry.title: [pimcore/pimcore] pimcore is vulnerable to cross-site scripting
entry.content:
Cross-site Scripting (XSS) - Reflected in GitHub repository pimcore/pimcore prior to 10.5.19.

References

  • https://nvd.nist.gov/vuln/detail/CVE-2023-1312
  • https://github.com/pimcore/pimcore/commit/d35d0712858f24d0ec96ddfd4cbe82ff4b5a5fbb
  • https://huntr.dev/bounties/2a64a32d-b1cc-4def-91da-18040d59f356
  • https://github.com/advisories/GHSA-gh4g-65f6-84g5

entry.title: [getgrav/grav] Open Redirect in Grav
entry.content:
Common/Grav.php in Grav before 1.6.23 has an Open Redirect.

References

  • https://nvd.nist.gov/vuln/detail/CVE-2020-11529
  • https://github.com/getgrav/grav/issues/3134
  • https://github.com/getgrav/grav/commit/2eae104c7a4bf32bc26cb8073d5c40464bfda3f7
  • https://getgrav.org/#changelog
  • https://github.com/advisories/GHSA-wrxc-mr2w-cjpv

entry.title: [snipe/snipe-it] snipe-it is vulnerable to Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF)
entry.content:
snipe-it is vulnerable to Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF)

References

  • https://nvd.nist.gov/vuln/detail/CVE-2021-4130
  • https://github.com/snipe/snipe-it/commit/9b2dd6522f214a3fbee6a4e32699104d0ea2b6ae
  • https://huntr.dev/bounties/ccf073cd-7f54-4d51-89f2-6b4a2e4ae81e
  • https://github.com/advisories/GHSA-4w23-c97g-fq5v

entry.title: [librenms/librenms] LibreNMS vulnerable to Cross-Site Scripting (XSS)
entry.content:
LibreNMS version 22.6.0 was discovered to contain a cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability via the component print-customoid.php.

References

  • https://nvd.nist.gov/vuln/detail/CVE-2022-36745
  • https://github.com/librenms/librenms/pull/14126
  • https://community.librenms.org/t/22-7-0-changelog/19213
  • https://github.com/advisories/GHSA-5229-94p3-7wwq

entry.title: [alextselegidis/easyappointments] Easy!Appointments uses hard-coded credentials
entry.content:
Use of Hard-coded Credentials in GitHub repository alextselegidis/easyappointments 1.4.3 and prior. A patch is available and anticipated to be part of version 1.5.0.

References

  • https://nvd.nist.gov/vuln/detail/CVE-2023-1269
  • https://github.com/alextselegidis/easyappointments/commit/2731d2f17c5140c562426b857e9f5d63da5c4593
  • https://huntr.dev/bounties/91c31eb6-024d-4ad3-88fe-f15b03fd20f5
  • https://github.com/advisories/GHSA-347f-rxg8-qgrv

entry.title: [moodle/moodle] Moodle Cross-site Scripting vulnerability
entry.content:
In Moodle, ID numbers displayed in the quiz override screens required additional sanitizing to prevent a stored XSS risk.

References

  • https://nvd.nist.gov/vuln/detail/CVE-2021-36399
  • https://moodle.org/mod/forum/discuss.php?d=424805
  • https://github.com/advisories/GHSA-79jp-m64f-pgrc

entry.title: [encore/laravel-admin] laravel-admin has Arbitrary File Upload vulnerability
entry.content:
An arbitrary file upload vulnerability in laravel-admin v1.8.19 allows attackers to execute arbitrary code via a crafted PHP file.

References

  • https://nvd.nist.gov/vuln/detail/CVE-2023-24249
  • https://flyd.uk/post/cve-2023-24249/
  • https://laravel-admin.org/
  • https://github.com/z-song/laravel-admin/issues/5726
  • https://github.com/advisories/GHSA-g857-47pm-3r32

entry.title: [frappant/frp-form-answers] frp_form_answers allows Cross-site Scripting
entry.content:
The frp_form_answers (aka Forms Export) extension before 3.1.2, and 4.x before 4.0.2, for TYPO3 allows XSS via saved emails.

References

  • https://nvd.nist.gov/vuln/detail/CVE-2023-26091
  • https://typo3.org/help/security-advisories
  • https://typo3.org/security/advisory/typo3-ext-sa-2023-002
  • https://github.com/frappant/frp_form_answers/commit/39fa16c8c792abdfc33e38bae17847364ff6a71d
  • https://github.com/advisories/GHSA-q3r2-23r8-wqr9

entry.title: [phpseclib/phpseclib] phpseclib Infinite Loop vulnerability
entry.content:
Math/PrimeField.php in phpseclib has an infinite loop with composite primefields. This vulnerability was introduced in version 3.0.0, and has been patched in 3.0.19. The CVE for this issue originally identified the the vulnerable version as 2.x, however, the vulnerable functionality was not introduced until version 3.

References

  • https://nvd.nist.gov/vuln/detail/CVE-2023-27560
  • https://github.com/phpseclib/phpseclib/commit/6298d1cd55c3ffa44533bd41906caec246b60440
  • https://github.com/phpseclib/phpseclib/commit/6298d1cd55c3ffa44533bd41906caec246b60440#commitcomment-103226722
  • https://github.com/phpseclib/phpseclib/releases/tag/3.0.19
  • https://github.com/FriendsOfPHP/security-advisories/blob/master/phpseclib/phpseclib/CVE-2023-27560.yaml
  • https://github.com/advisories/GHSA-hm7p-r324-hhf3

entry.title: [moodle/moodle] Moodle has Incorrect Default Permissions
entry.content:
In Moodle, insufficient capability checks meant message deletions were not limited to the current user.

References

  • https://nvd.nist.gov/vuln/detail/CVE-2021-36397
  • https://moodle.org/mod/forum/discuss.php?d=424803
  • https://github.com/advisories/GHSA-2wmj-8mqg-r9q8

entry.title: [moodle/moodle] Moodle Cross-site Scripting vulnerability
entry.content:
In Moodle, ID numbers displayed in the web service token list required additional sanitizing to prevent a stored XSS risk.

References

  • https://nvd.nist.gov/vuln/detail/CVE-2021-36398
  • https://moodle.org/mod/forum/discuss.php?d=424804
  • https://github.com/advisories/GHSA-786g-xv8v-9h93
